Headline: #93 California/Dodge Temporary Reroute at Foster/Albany
ShortDescription: 93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Bryn Mawr and California due to street blockage near Foster/Albany.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Bryn Mawr and California due to street blockage near Foster/Albany.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks near Harlem (O'Hare). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks near Harlem (O'Hare).

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th, #108 Halsted/95th, #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95 95th , 112 Vincennes/111th, 108 Halsted/95th buses rred EB:95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette & 95th; WB: 95th Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, & 95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th, #108 Halsted/95th and #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
